ygData.subject: Re: Sneak
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You will start to walk slowly. ... Untill a mob see you and attack you. ... Yes. The button will be disabled. ... Yes. 75 i think. ... Not mutch... At lvl
ygData.messageBody:
"Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" wrote:

> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> Forgive me if this has been covered before..
>
> Being 17th level and new to the sneak
> skill.. Can someone tell me what it's
> good for? I try to practice it as often
> as possible but a few things I've noticed:
>
> 1. How do you know if you're successful?

You will start to walk slowly.

> 2. How long does it last if you are?

Untill a mob see you and attack you.

> 3. It appears you can't sneak if you're
> playing any song. Is this correct?

Yes. The button will be disabled.

> 4. Do we have a skill cap on it?

Yes. 75 i think.

> 5. What's it good for?

Not mutch... At lvl 19, you get the invisibility song, it is mutch better thank
sneak.

The only use i can think about is to bring a Vendor to Indifferent( when they
don't have any faction, like the Aviak Vendor in South Karana). If they do have
a faction, use Cinda's Charismatic Carrillion, they will become Amiable...

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

If a cow laughs hard, does milk come out of it's nose?
